alert.note: Alert for Cabo Rojo; Guanica; Hormigueros; Lajas; San German (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued October 27 at 8:54AM ADT until October 27 at 12:00PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Cabo Rojo County in Puerto Rico... Guanica County in Puerto Rico... Hormigueros County in Puerto Rico... Lajas County in Puerto Rico... San German County in Puerto Rico... * Until 1100 AM AST. * At 754 AM AST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.

area.areaDesc: Cabo Rojo; Guanica; Hormigueros; Lajas; San German
